ComicInfo.Title: A Feeling; The Only People Who've Ever Seen Me Naked; His Face; The Day; Her Leg; That Girl; Those People; This Morning; An Idea; My Life
ComicInfo.Summary:
The woman walks up the stairs, enters her apartment, lies on the couch, gives the cat food, makes some pasta, drinks some water and goes to sleep on the couch. A wordless sequence.
The woman works the cash register, sweeps the floor, locks the shop door, moves and waters some flowers and checks out. A wordless sequence.
The woman receives a delivery of flowers, builds up a bouqet, stares at the clock and clips some flowers for display. A wordless sequence.
The woman walks in the rain to her florist job. She opens the shop, reads a note, turns on the lights, tends to some flowers and puts on lipstick. A wordless sequence.
The woman starts the laundry machine, switches blouses a few times, lies on her bed staring at a hook on the ceiling, and then steps out of the house while its raining. A wordless sequence.
The woman sleeps, wakes up, takes a shower, goes to the market, sees a dead robin on the curb, picks a flower, sits down on her couch and tends to a basket of clothes. A wordless sequence.
